titleStmt.title: Orders enacted for orphans and for their portions within the citie of Excester with sundry other instructions incident to the same. Collected and set foorth by Iohn Vowell alias Hooker gentleman and chamberlaine of the same citie.
titleStmt.author: Hooker, John, 1526?-1601.

notesStmt.note: Imprint and suggested publication date from STC.
